price: 16. Ce sont ceux-là qui ont troqué la juste voie contre l’égarement. Leur commerce alors n’a point prospéré et ils n’ont pas su trouver le droit chemin.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَٰرَتُهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ish'tarawū al-ḍalālata bil-hudā famā rabiḥat tijāratuhum wamā kānū muh'tadīna
